Constructor Detail

World

public World(BattlePanel1 k)
Creates a world and sends it the BattlePanel as an argument. This allows for easier communication between the world and the BattlePanel, for when a character gets into a fight or enters the Gym. It displays basic instructions for the user.

Parameters:
k - Assigns the BattlePanel to battle.

public int spaceFacing()
